places.name: Campus Center
places.info: The Campus Center is a hub for student activities and services, providing a variety of resources and spaces for students.

places.name: POST
places.info: POST (Pacific Ocean Science and Technology) building houses research facilities and classrooms for marine science and technology programs.

places.name: Bale
places.info: Bale offers delicious Vietnamese food including banh mi and pho. A popular spot for students and faculty.
